Question
========

A lottery is played with tickets numbered from 000 to 999. Everyone gets a lottery ticket and only one player can win if his or her number is chosen. How many possible outcomes does this game have?

Answerlist
----------

* 3
* 9
* 999
* 1000

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 3: Incorrect
* 9: Incorrect
* 999: Incorrect
* 1000: Correct
